job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: The team works on multiple dimensionsltbrgtltbrgtUnique opportunity to work with open sourceltbrgtWork on Security Onboarding and platform integrations with cutting edge Cloud security featuresltbrgtKey responsibilities includeltbrgtltbrgtWork on developing code samples in the areas of mTLS and authenticationltbrgtWork on onboarding security features ltbrgtltbrgtMandatoryltbrgtExperienced with an opensource software development environment  Familiar with Golang  Bachelors in Engineering Computer Science is preferred or equivalence of industry experienceltbrgtDesiredltbrgtExperience in the following domain areas is a plus  Networking  AuthenticationIdentity  API Client development
